item.title: Erin add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Erin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Erin add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The future depends on what you do today." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Erin add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Ester asked why people are sad. "Thatâ€™s simple," says the old man. "They are the prisoners of their personal history. Everyone believes that the main aim in life is to follow a plan. They never ask if that plan is theirs or if it was created by another person. They accumulate experiences, memories, things, other people's ideas, and it is more than they can possibly cope with. And that is why they forget their dreams." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Erin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Erin add a quote by Franklin D. Roosevelt
item.description: "We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future." -- Franklin D. Roosevelt

item.title: Erin add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Real generosity towards the future lies in giving all to the present." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Erin add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "The past is a ghost, the future a dream and all we ever have is now." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Erin add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It was amazing how you could get so far from where you'd planned, and yet find it was exactly were you needed to be." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Erin add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "When we're incomplete, we're always searching for somebody to complete us. When, after a few years or a few months of a relationship, we find that we're still unfulfilled, we blame our partners and take up with somebody more promising. This can go on and on--series polygamy--until we admit that while a partner can add sweet dimensions to our lives, we, each of us, are responsible for our own fulfillment. Nobody else can provide it for us, and to believe otherwise is to delude ourselves dangerously and to program for eventual failure every relationship we enter." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Erin add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "Maybe you can afford to wait. Maybe for you there's a tomorrow. Maybe for you there's one thousand tomorrows, or three thousand, or ten, so much time you can bathe in it, roll around it, let it slide like coins through you fingers. So much time you can waste it. But for some of us there's only today. And the truth is, you never really know." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Erin add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Erin add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "The only way that we can live, is if we grow. The only way that we can grow is if we change. The only way that we can change is if we learn. The only way we can learn is if we are exposed. And the only way that we can become exposed is if we throw ourselves out into the open. Do it. Throw yourself." -- C. JoyBell C.
